title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: An in-depth course on data structures and algorithms, covering various topics essential for computer science and software engineering.

lessons.title: Introduction to Data Structures
lessons.content: This lesson provides an overview of data structures and their importance in computer science. We will discuss various types of data structures and their applications.

lessons.title: Arrays and Linked Lists
lessons.content: In this lesson, we will explore arrays and linked lists. We will cover their structure, operations, advantages, and disadvantages.

lessons.title: Stacks and Queues
lessons.content: This lesson covers stacks and queues, including their operations, implementation, and use cases.

lessons.title: Trees and Graphs
lessons.content: We will dive into trees and graphs, discussing their types, traversal methods, and algorithms for searching and sorting.
